author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012898

Deep Deep Deep Nightmare is a 2D Top Down Shooter. A little boy didn’t listen to his mother’s warnings that eating too much at night would cause nightmares. Now, he must face hordes of monsters and defeat the nightmare bosses to escape.

DEFEAT THE NIGHTMARE BOSSES
Face mini-bosses and nightmare bosses. Use your weapons and skills to win each battle.

SURVIVE THE HORDES OF MONSTERS AND TRAPS
Withstand waves of monsters and deadly traps. Test your skills in increasingly difficult levels.

CHOOSE YOUR ARSENAL
Build your arsenal with a variety of weapons and spells. Personalize your strategy and always be ready for the next enemy.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Deep Deep Deep Nightmare - Release Date Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10007310

Pocket Bravery is stepping into the ring on April 10th, 2025, launching on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4! Inspired by classic 90s fighters, Pocket Bravery delivers fast-paced combat, elemental-based special moves, rollback netcode for smooth online battles, and a diverse roster of warriors ready to throw down!
title: Pocket Bravery - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
